sentences.sContent: Neither the lizard nor the glass has any secrets.
sentences.sContent_eng: Neither the lizard nor the glass has any secrets.
sentences.sCn: 无论是蜥蜴还是玻璃，都没有任何秘密。

sentences.sContent: A lizard will regenerate its tail if it's cut off.
sentences.sContent_eng: A lizard will regenerate its tail if it's cut off.
sentences.sCn: 蜥蜴的尾巴如被切掉，它会重新生出一条尾巴。

sentences.sContent: Meetings are just one symptom of anorganization run by the lizard brain.
sentences.sContent_eng: Meetings are just one symptom of anorganization run by the lizard brain.
sentences.sCn: 会海只是这类靠蜥蜴脑运作的组织的一个症状。

trans.tranOther: a type of reptile that has four legs and a long tail
